text: Bernard Jean Marcel Fauqueux (2 September 1938 - 1 June 1989) was a French gymnast. He competed at the 1960 Summer Olympics and the 1964 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:1989 deaths Category:French male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of France Category:Gymnasts at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Gymnasts at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:People from Vernon, Eure
title: Bernard Fauqueux
